name: Strange Terror From Beyond The Stars!
name_original: Strange Terror From Beyond The Stars!
description:
There were twenty crew members at the beginning of this expedition. Now only five remain after the martian attack...

Witness a truely horrifying sci-fi game, with a 60s aesthetic. Each time you play, you'll go up against one of fifteen monsters (Now 17 cause of the new update!), each with their own special abilities. Including special guests such as, The Xenomorph and Uber Jason.

This game was directed by none other than Dave Microwaves Games! A semi known game developer. Featuring voice actors such as JayskiBean, who plays the brave soul who is desperately trying to escape the ship. NathanBlakeGames, who plays the pilot, warning the player of impending doom. And TheGameSalmon, who plays the General Maintenance Worker stuck in a closet...

Will you be able to survive playing through this entire film- erm, game?
